dict.string:
Compuware Mobile Center of Excellence
The Compuware Event Host Application you're using now represents the cutting-edge mobility work being executed by Compuware, the technology performance company, and its newly developed Mobile Center of Excellence (MCoE). If you want to develop, implement and manage a high-performance mobility strategy to drive revenue, customer satisfaction and brand awareness, Compuware is ready to be your trusted partner.
Mobile development requires the ability to continually adapt to a rapidly changing technological landscape and constantly evolving customer and business expectations. The MCoE relies on our world-class IT experience and an Adaptive Agile Methodology to develop, implement and deliver sophisticated, flexible, secure mobile solutions, with quality performance across all platforms and devices from back-end integration to the most advanced inter-machine communication.
MCoE technology labs provide a unique environment for secure and personal client collaboration. Starting with a diagnostic approach, we determine the specific needs for each client and project, and assemble a specialized team for the assignment that can integrate and work with client stakeholders. We always encourage hands-on collaboration with clients throughout project development to ensure mobile programs grow and evolve with changing requirements.
Contact your Compuware Account Manager for more on our mobility offerings today.
